CustomField.formula: IF(MC_Conversion_Type__c="", Order_Quantity__c * Unit_Price__c, CASE ( MC_Conversion_Type__c , "/",(Order_Quantity__c * Unit_Price__c) * MC_Conversion_Rate__c , "*",(Order_Quantity__c * Unit_Price__c) / MC_Conversion_Rate__c , Order_Quantity__c * Unit_Price__c))
CustomField.label: Extended Amount MC
